CustomField.description: After the specified number of days, NPSP updates the Recurring Donation Status to the Status Automation Lapsed Value if donations aren't being received as expected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: After the specified number of days, NPSP updates the Recurring Donation Status to the Status Automation Lapsed Value if donations aren't being received as expected.
CustomField.label: Status Automation Days for Lapsed
